comment: These are pretty good! I think I would add more lime juice and tequila.
I added grapefruit and orange bitters and a bit of pineapple juice.
I added some simple syrup to make it a little sweeter, then not bad. If I make another will probably halve the lemon juice and see how it tastes.
Tried the recipe! So refreshing! Fresh lime juice and a good tequila make this really delicious.
This was pretty good, but it needed something. I did add simple syrup. Maybe I will try more Grand Marnier next time.
Best ever! No sweetening needed. Just be careful, they are very drinkable. Thank you for sharing!!!
These are made with real liquor!! Not flavored wine or beer or malt beverage. Real vodka, real tequila, and real rum! They are already winning in my book!!
I didn’t have agave so I added a slice and a squeeze of fresh orange in each glass. Cuts through the tartness for me. Other than that, it’s a hit!
Excellent drink! I think I will have two more :).
We loved it! I added 2 tbsp of Maple Syrup to a 2 servings and it taste awesome! Our #1 for this summer.
